Pre-Game Insights: West Indies look to make early moves in the Caribbean leg of T20 World Cup 2024.
West Indies aim for redemption after poor performances in the last two editions.
PNG have experienced players and could pose a challenge despite West Indies' form.
West Indies have a strong batting lineup with Nicholas Pooran, Rovman Powell, and Andre Russell.
PNG have a pace-dominated attack with Charles Amini as their primary spinner.
Teams batting second have generally fared better at Providence in T20 games.
Weather conditions could impact the match, with a chance of showers and thunderstorms.
